references.paper_title: A Baseline for Detecting Misclassified and Out-of-Distribution Examples in Neural Networks
references.reason: This paper establishes a foundational baseline for out-of-distribution detection, providing a benchmark against which subsequent methods can be compared.

references.paper_title: Enhancing the Reliability of Out-of-Distribution Image Detection in Neural Networks
references.reason: This work significantly advances the understanding of OOD detection in image classification by proposing a method to improve model reliability and reduce overconfidence.

references.paper_title: Predictive Uncertainty Estimation via Prior Networks
references.reason: This study introduces a novel approach to uncertainty estimation using prior networks, offering a valuable tool for robust OOD detection.

references.paper_title: Evidential Deep Learning to Quantify Classification Uncertainty
references.reason: This paper is foundational to the use of evidential deep learning for OOD detection and uncertainty estimation, influencing many subsequent works.
This paper provides a comprehensive benchmark for evaluating OOD detection methods, enabling more robust comparisons and driving further research in the field.
